song.englishname: Moving For The Sake Of Motion

english.segment1: Someone please turn the lights back on. I've been wandering here for days, disconnected, and in search. For new air to breathe in
english.segment2: I don't think I can fix this. Don't think I could change
english.segment3: But that's the problem. We never speak to Him. Our walls have caged us in. And I can't quite remember
english.segment4: This was the first time I didn't say enough. This was the only time I kept it close enough
english.segment5: Brace yourself! They're not waking up
english.segment6: Oh, my God. I hate the me that I've become. This needy useless forgetting one. Truthfully I can't be the me that I've washed up to be
english.segment7: Don't stop breathing. The walls have just begun to spin. Just let the water calm you this time. It's all around you, just open your eyes and take a look. It will never kill you; not this time
english.segment8: It's all around you. We're surrounded for all I care
english.segment9: Brace yourself right now. Lights out I'm not breathing. I can't keep swimming, can't keep my head up.
